Intro.Message: There's one thing I never liked on our story
Intro.SubMessage: And I am going to change it today - swipe right

Intro.Message: You never swiped right for me
I will get my revenge today
I wrote 366 reasons why I love you
And you will need to swipe right on every one of them
I've been writing them for a while, one a day, every day

Intro.SubMessage: Swipe right for me... keep swiping right for me

End.Message: I hope you understand how much I love you
End.SubMessage: And I hope your fingers are ok

End.Message: So now, leave the phone there and get changed

End.SubMessage: But just before you forget... (swipe last time)
